1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Relmap operators.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Rop
6  ( -- * Relmap operator
7    Rop' (..), RopGroup, FindRop',
8    ropUsage,
9    -- * Constructor
10    RopCons', Intmed' (..),
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                  as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap           as C
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap.Relmap    as C
18
19
20-- ----------------------  Relmap operator
21
22-- | Implementation of relmap operator.
23data Rop' h c = Rop
24    { ropName     :: C.RopName        -- ^ Operator name
25    , ropGroup    :: RopGroup         -- ^ Operator group
26    , ropAttr     :: S.AttrLayout     -- ^ Attribute of operator
27    , ropParaze   :: S.AttrParaze String     -- ^ Attribute parameterizer
28    , ropCons     :: RopCons' h c     -- ^ Constructor of operator
29    }
30
31instance Show (Rop' h c) where
32    show Rop { ropName = name, ropGroup = group }
33        = "Rop " ++ group ++ "/" ++ name
34
35instance B.Name (Rop' h c) where
36    name = ropName
37
38-- | Group of operators.
39type RopGroup = String
40
41-- | Find relmap operator based on its name.
42type FindRop' h c = C.RopName -> Maybe (Rop' h c)
43
44-- | Usage text of relmap operator.
45ropUsage :: Rop' h c -> String
46ropUsage = S.attrUsageString . ropAttr
47
48
49-- ----------------------  Constructor
50
51-- | Constructor of relmap operator,
52--   i.e., function from intermediate relamp to generic relmap.
53type RopCons' h c = Intmed' h c -> B.Ab (C.Relmap' h c)
54
55-- | Intermediate relmap, that is in between lexmap and generic relmap.
56data Intmed' h c = Intmed
57    { medHook     :: h c
58    , medLexmap   :: C.Lexmap         -- ^ Syntactic data of operator use
59    , medSubmap   :: [(String, C.Relmap' h c)]  -- ^ Subrelmaps
60    } deriving (Show)
61
62instance B.GetCodePos (Intmed' h c) where
63    getCPs = B.getCPs . medLexmap
64
65instance (D.GetCops h) => D.GetCops (Intmed' h) where
66    getCops = D.getCops . medHook
67
